definition: to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

sentences.english: And Benetton is struggling to find its place in fashion.
sentences.chinese: 貝納通正努力在時尚界尋找自己的位置。

sentences.english: The campaign got a quick reaction from the Vatican.
sentences.chinese: 梵蒂岡迅速對貝納通的廣告做出了迴應。
